All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Alerts
Customized alert dialog class for displaying various types of alerts.
BackEndServer
The BackEndServer class extends the AbstractServer class from the OCSF framework, providing a backend server implementation for handling client connections, messages, and interactions with a database for a specific application.
CancellationReport
Represents a report detailing daily cancellations and unfulfilled orders for a specific park and month.
ChangeRequest
Represents a change request for a park's operational parameters such as capacity, gap between visits, and stay time.
ChangeRequest.ApprovalStatus
Approval statuses for a change request.
ClientConnectionStatus
Represents a connection status to the server for live auditing in the screen
ClientController<T>
The controller class responsible for handling client-side operations and communication with the server.
ClientServerMessage<T>
Represents a message exchanged between client and server, containing data and a command.
ClientUI
The main class representing the client-side user interface of the application.
CreateVisitorsReportController
Controller class for creating and managing a visitors report UI.
DatabaseController
Manages database operations for the user management system.
DeparmentManegerController
Controller for the Department Manager's UI in the application.
DepartmentManagerCancellationReportController
Controller class for the Department Manager's Cancellation and Unfulfilled Orders Report.
DepartmentManagerReportsController
Controls the Department Manager Reports GUI.
DepartmentManagerVisitsReportController
Controller for the Department Manager Visits Report GUI.
DisplayIF
This interface implements the abstract method used to display objects onto the client or server UIs.
GeneralParkWorker
Represents a general worker in a park management system.
HomePageController
Controller class for managing the home page view.
InputValidation
Provides methods for input validation in the client application.
Message
Represents a message with an address, content, and sending date.
MessageHandlerFromClient
The MessageHandlerFromClient class handles messages received from clients.
MySqlConnector
This class is responsible for establishing a connection to a MySQL database.
NavigationManager
Manages navigation within the application, facilitating opening new pages and controlling their behavior.
NotifyThread
NotifyThread class implements Runnable.
Operation
The Operation class contains constants representing various operations That are passing between the client and the server.
Order
Represents an order for visiting a park.
Order.status
Enum representing the status of an order.
Order.typeOfOrder
Enum representing the type of an order.
OrderAVisitController
This Class is the GUI controller of OrderVisit.fxml It handles all the JavaFx nodes events.
OrderChecker
The OrderChecker class provides utility methods for checking orders and parks.
OrderNotification
The OrderNotification class represents a notification associated with an order.
Park
The Park class represents a park entity.
ParkManagerController
Controller for the main screen of the Park Manager in the GUI.
ParkmanagerCreateUsageReportController
Controller class for creating and displaying a usage report in the park manager's interface.
ParkmanagerReportController
Controller class for managing park reports within the GUI.
ParkParametersController
Controls the Park Parameters GUI, allowing users to view and understand park-specific parameters.
ParkWorkerAvailableSpaceController
 
ParkWorkerController
 
ParkWorkerEntrenceControlController
 
ParkWorkerShowBillController
 
ParkWorkerUnorderedVisitController
 
Pricing
The Pricing class represents pricing information for different types of visits.
ProfileController
The ProfileController class is responsible for controlling the Profile view.
RegisterExistingTravelerController
Controller class for managing the registration of an existing traveler as a group guide.
RegisterNewGuideController
Controller class for managing the registration of a new group guide.
Report
Represents a detailed report related to park operations, including usage and visitor statistics.
Report.ReportType
Enum defining the possible types of reports that can be generated.
ServerApp
This class serves as the entry point for a server application using JavaFX.
ServerController
Controller class for the server GUI.
ServiceWorkerController
Controller class for managing the service worker view.
ShowUsageReportController
Controller class for displaying a usage report within a GridPane layout.
ShowVisitorsReportController
Controller class for displaying a visitors report.
SystemClient
A client class representing the system client communicating with the backend server.
Traveler
The Traveler class represents a traveler in the system.
TravelerChecker
This class is responsible for showing alerts to visitors that their order is within 24 hours or they have a spot in the park if they entered waitinglist
TravelerFrameController
Controls the behavior of the traveler frame, allowing the traveler to navigate through different functionalities.
TravelerLoginController
Controller class for managing traveler login.
TravelerOrdersController
Controller class for managing traveler orders.
TravelerWaitingListsController
Controller class for managing the traveler's waiting lists view.
UpdateParametersController
Controls the UI and logic for sending requests to update park parameters by a Park Manager.
UpdateStatusThread
A thread designed to update database statuses at specific times.
UsageReport
Represents a usage report for a park, detailing daily usage statistics and the park's capacity.
UserConnectController
Controller for user connection UI.
UserManagementSystemDB
Responsible to import employee information from external database
Usermanager
The Usermanager class manages the current user sessions in the system.
ViewRequestsForChangesController
 
Visit
The Visit class represents a visit made by a traveler to a park.
VisitData
Represents the data for a single visit to a park, including the time of entry, the duration of the visit, and the type of order under which the visit was made.
VisitorsReport
Represents a report detailing the types and total number of visitors to a park within a specific period.
VisitReport
Represents a report of all visits to a specific park during a given month.
VisitReport.TypeOfOrder
Defines the type of visit/order.
WaitingChecker
The WaitingChecker class provides utility methods for checking and managing waiting lists.
WaitingList
The WaitingList class represents a waiting list for orders in the system.
WaitingList.statusWaiting
Enum representing the possible status of a waiting list.
WaitingListControl
The WaitingListControl class manages all travelers on the waiting list within the system.
WaitingListController
 
WorkerLoginController
Controller class for managing the worker login functionality.
